text: Uni ajhai kothama ubhi'i namaja padhirakheka thi'e ki kothama yattikaima pharistaharule uhamla'i avaja di'e ki (jakariya!) Allahale timila'i yahayako niscita subhasandesa dincha, jasale ki allahako vacanala'i pramanita garnecha ra nayaka hunecha ra lipsamukta allahako nabi ani satya nisthavana manisa hunecha
